case.title: your long distance girlfriend - 20
case.text: Hi, Are you up for it?. We will just flirt a bit and tell each other how our day(s) went. We will talk about our interests, likes and dislikes. You can talk about life in London and I will tell you about Africa . We will get to know one another as best we can over email. We will be nice to each other and get to unload our gripes onto each other. We can flirt as much as your are comfortable with and if you find someone real during our emails I will be happy for you and wish you luck.
